consentModal.title: Consent Settings
consentModal.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and gather basic statistical data about visitors.

sections.title: Cookie usage
sections.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and gather basic statistical data about visitors.

sections.title: Strictly necessary cookies
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of my website. Without these cookies, the website would not work properly

sections.title: Performance and Analytics cookies
sections.description: These cookies allow the website to remember the choices you have made in the past

sections.title: More information
sections.description: For any queries in relation to our policy on cookies and your choices, please contact us.
